title: Cyber_Alien
author: Cyber_Alien
content: Nigeria matter don tire me on fraud oo nah so you go see news all the time about fraud wey guys they do even outside the country. I just dey read news for nairaland na him I see say they arrest 2 of our guys in India for fraud. Dey dupe doctor in India for N6.6mhttps://www.nairaland.com/7521381/two-nigerian-fraudsters-arrested-dupingAbeg make we dey encourage ourselves whenever we dey gathering to stop all this act. We know say work no dey de country at least make we try create one for ourselves. They get all this online work wey they give money without dupe we can learn digital skills like Affiliate marketing, copywriting, web developer, security analyst and even dis forum they give money when you participate in all this signature campaign. You can call your friends that are jobless and give them the legit. All this work they legit people go pay you well when you do work for them.And again if there is any legit, wey we no say money dey come out make we tell our people, to reduce and eradicate this bad names wey we dey give ourselves.How una think am?

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Nigeria is the most popular country that is well known with fraud and all this scam activity and still the issue is not burder most of leaders and seriously the issue is damaging our country images, although we know say many of youth's be unemployed but we get hand to work like labour work and still get money but now a days many of Nigeria youth's no want to work with their hands again everybody wants to enjoy free money and from those fraud activities that lead some to spiritual activities and end with mental illnesses and some lead to death.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Sure these fruad activities don too much e they everywhere but naija own worse pass.. Wetin they course these thing be say na naija government be the main course of fraud for the country if na the way people get knowledge to use in fraud the government now use the opportunity to create a way for them make they, they use that knowledge chop food e go better pass, but how person go suffer for almost 18yrs going to school since e deh small Las Las we finish school we no get job..No be everybody get that mind of staying without job atleast men go Chop na they're using the knowledge wey they get on illegal things which na government be the main source of these

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Na wetin dey happen for the country na e naija boiz cari go India,our leaders don keep the country carelessly wey make majority of Nigerians start to do so many lie lie things. We don cast everywhere because of our corrupt life. We forum members no dey like that because for here na trust sure pass,so we no go fit be scammers. Boiz now no won calm down use their head learn one or two,instead na sharp sharp money dem dey find. We need proper orientation to commot this corrupt mindset

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Two people na won give country of over 160 million people bad name? Some kind talk de taya me he don tay the country cast for Oyibo people ear. Nigerian Prince dey Wikipedia as ‚Äùa cheat who seeks to obtain money through advance fee scams quotations ‚ñº I fell for a Nigerian prince scam.‚Äù The case na yeye case, the Indian doctor shock me, how person way dey educated go dey find love potion and charm to use for man nor be crime be that or the laws dey different for their own people.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: I nor dey try invalidate the message wey you dey pass o, but you see that India eh, na dem do fraud pass. Na just say na Naija own dem dey blow out of proportion. Back to your message - Some Nigerians don believe say without fraud them nor fit make am. The problem now come be say it is more than just getting a job in Affiliate marketing, copywriting, web developer, security analyst, these boys and girls nor dey patient again. They want the blink blink now. They want the pomp and pageantry now.. Dem want make dem sing dorime for them. And they want to hit it big. 100k, 200k ¬†and even 500k nor fit do anything for them. To commot for fraud na mind thing first before getting a job.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Dis Mata dey always give me headache all d time bcus this bad guys Don spoil tins for ground. Now many countries no trust naija pipu again due to this bad fraud activities wen this naija guys carry for hands. Nowadays no white man dey trust us for any deal again except u have powerful connections. e go dey hard now to see beta deal done with white man especially online bcus they believe naija is fully of fraud pipu.Op I see sai u dey talk about make we dey teach guys way where money go they commot, Dat one no be problem my bro, But make I clear u with one tin,all those guys involve in fraud activities na lazy guys dey be, even u try give them Link for where small small money go dey come and dey go dey use their energy and brain dey no do bcus they no b serious type before. Make u hear, I Don introduce this forum to one of¬† my lodge guy B4 due to Dat make e dey get¬† little little change for hand, but last last he no do oo¬† bcus it is lazy type and it looking for easy money, which we no it no possible expect fraud, now na yahoo yahoo d guy b now oo.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Look lemme tell you one thing you don't know about our Nigerian boys, let us forget the fact that we here on this forum trying to reason out good things, there are some boys you would called to join you here and learn free skills and build their accounts on this forum they won't Instead they can't endure after joining this platform for 1 to 3 months without any good cash flow to their hands they will leave here and look for another alt means of making money instead for them to focused here they decides to join internet frauds. I basically have introduced about 15 boys to this forum here but few of them said they don't have all time to seat and be reading things around this forum.Somehow i began to digest what our president says about our youth that " We are lazy" yes this purely truth, because only few youths i noticed that are working hard to make out clean money instead of joining internet frauds. I believe we that are here have a very big seperate mentality. Then moved down to governments, they aren't trying in any case to help the youths at all, if there were to be work would there be any way youths would go involved in any malactivity?No! because they aren't talking responsibility.That is why i used to beg our brothers here to please be patient while you are here, little time your shoe go shine and your face go show and as e day you go dey see am live!

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Na two things dey cause dis kind matta of fraud among we naija people, which is:¬†‚Ä¢ unemployment and,‚Ä¢ laziness ( seeking for quick success).¬†The height of unemployment for we con3 dey too alarming and even di government no dey do anytin hep curb d situation. Instead of Dem to tink of initiative wey go create employment for the timid population Dem go rather the tink of how to di loot from the country porse and now many of the youths don mk up their mind say anyway na way. So why fraud no go envelope us as a pipo everywer.Another issue wey be laziness ,some pipo no wan pop it energy n time run sometin wey go pay Dem in time to com ,Dem d find d one wey go bring moni now now. Imagine say I tk time introduce to my friends for street about Bitcointalk and how to tk go about it for the growth process, this boys rejected di project, Dem say Dem no need anything wey go stress Dem n no go even bring money sharp sharp. Say Dem no go fit di crack der head di write write tins everytime. But dis na same guys wey day and night na inside bet9ja shop Dem dey playing virtual sport betting. From day day Dem reject d offer I stop to dey datch Dem moni wen Dem beg for my hep.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Cyber_Alien on January 12, 2023, 12:26:31 PMNigeria matter don tire me on fraud oo nah so you go see news all the time about fraud wey guys they do even outside the country. I just dey read news for nairaland na him I see say they arrest 2 of our guys in India for fraud. Dey dupe doctor in India for N6.6mhttps://www.nairaland.com/7521381/two-nigerian-fraudsters-arrested-dupingAbeg make we dey encourage ourselves whenever we dey gathering to stop all this act. We know say work no dey de country at least make we try create one for ourselves. They get all this online work wey they give money without dupe we can learn digital skills like Affiliate marketing, copywriting, web developer, security analyst and even dis forum they give money when you participate in all this signature campaign. You can call your friends that are jobless and give them the legit. All this work they legit people go pay you well when you do work for them.And again if there is any legit, wey we no say money dey come out make we tell our people, to reduce and eradicate this bad names wey we dey give ourselves.How una think am?My brother, the Problem be say, no be every body wan suffer create work for im self, especially as dem see say people wey de do dis kind fraud de make am quickly.Na better advice u bring but persin need to de convince him friends because me and u know say some people regard all these online jobs as scam, and you no fit force person to do wetting him/her no wan do, your own na just to try your best.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Nigerian youths are complaining about lack of jobs, but even when they travel outside of their country, they don't still find something useful to involve themselves in but rather go on implicating themselves and causing bad name for their nation. It's so bad for a country's citizen to travel to another country and do some shite that ends up giving his or her country a bad name.@Adbitco, Just keep extending helping hands to those you feel need them; most will realize the value and rippe the benefits, and they will thank you for it. Those who don't value it because they need quick cash, should feel free to do as they please. In this economy of our time, every person has what is favorable to them, but illegalities are what I don't support.¬†Let the youth learn from the mistakes of others who have run amok; some are now into trouble they can't excape, and some are now severely derailed.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I just believe say everything na about choice. Doz guys choose the path to quick moni and now police don nab dem. Wetin dey appalling na the rate at which diz guys dey quick to join this kain tin as if nah the only source of wealth be dat. @Adbitco, I reason wetin you talk so. Sometimes, our youths dey too lazy to involve in somtin profitable and as such, e dey worry even the good ones wey wan use dia life do beta tin abroad becos diz oda ones don go spoil am.¬†In such a situation, nah who we wan blame? Lack of job opportunities, laziness or the devil's handwork??

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on January 15, 2023, 12:20:24 AMthere are some boys you would called to join you here and learn free skills and build their accounts on this forum they won't Instead they can't endure after joining this platform for 1 to 3 months without any good cash flow to their hands they will leave here and look for another alt means of making money instead for them to focused here they decides to join internet frauds. I basically have introduced about 15 boys to this forum here but few of them said they don't have all time to seat and be reading things around this forum.God go samma you triplets for dis ogbenge yarn wey you dish here. My broda, d thing dey scatter my head too wen I look at peeps wey I drag com here but dem later run comot as dem not fit endure reading, posting and waiting to rank up. Some of dem na me even pay dat evil IP fees for dem sef, just wasted my cash for nothing. E dey pain enta bone. Even yesterday sef, I dey with person wey I supposed bring here but I nor need dat stress for now. Him go still run comot.By the way, OP shey you don hear of "Call Centre" for India? Check dat up and you nor go eva pity anything India. Dem be kura too.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on January 18, 2023, 05:44:01 AMGod go samma you triplets for dis ogbenge yarn wey you dish here. My broda, d thing dey scatter my head too wen I look at peeps wey I drag com here but dem later run comot as dem not fit endure reading, posting and waiting to rank up. Some of dem na me even pay dat evil IP fees for dem sef, just wasted my cash for nothing. E dey pain enta bone. Even yesterday sef, I dey with person wey I supposed bring here but I nor need dat stress for now. Him go still run comot.Many people dey look for the easy way but dem fail to understand say something wey dey worthwhile takes time. Patience is a virtue, as you dey contribute to the forum naso you go dey rank up and naso your reward go long. But keep the rewards aside, being here and interacting with people from different backgrounds, works of life, ethnicity, religion and races you get to learn new things, see things from different perspective and you fit get one information wey go just change your life forever. But some people no dey see am so.

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: One thing wey I don know Nigeria for be say,anything wey dem don decide to do,dem dey doam too much,and that too much nai dey make people of the world feel and talk say dem bad.When Niger people start to dey do scam,dem doam to the extend wey be say the thing don dey too common for street,and e don dey become our way of living.I no fit talk say we dey give ourselves bad news because say everybody know say e no easy to survive,and if e be say na dat one go work for them,dem dey doam fully.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Justinmoon on January 21, 2023, 09:19:08 AMDue to the high rate of poverty in Nigeriaüò©üò©üò©üò©, it's citizens tends to immigrate to other neighboring countries around them. ‚òëÔ∏èSome Nigerians takes their bad behaviors along side themüòûüòû, thereby creating a bad image for their own country.üòûüòû I recently watched a video of Nigerian cult clash which happened some years ago in dubia. In the video you can see how these Nigerian youths who were armed, harassing and chasing people from the street. With these behaviors, the government of other countries can decide to ban Nigerians from immigrating into their countries so as to prevent loss of life.With the forthcoming election, we all pray that Nigeria gets a good President who can restore Nigerians economy back to it's fullest.üôèüôèüôåüôåüôå‚òëÔ∏èI no even know say you be naija, nai you dey worry technical board with plagiarism and smileys, them don report your account I no know wether moderators go pity you. If you get second chance abeg nor make this kind error again. Try reduce the smiley for text bitcointalk different from fb, ig and other Plato forms you dey used to, with time you go understand. If you never know wetin to write, you fit dey write for our local board here things go dey easy for you.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Abeg make we leave this mata for who the matter concern ¬†because this country no follow and just incase you no know, make I also remind you say yahoo money dey sweet die and na less hassle but nothing dey easy if we go fit admit the truth. This yahoo matter don even tire me and despite say I no support am, atleast I know say this yahoo on the other hand don deliver people but that one no be excuse Sha.We suppose know say the country don already hard and even graduate no fit see work because companies dey look for people with minimum of two to three years working experience and yahoo na the only work wey person fit easily think of because if you go agree with me say no legit work dey easy not even the little ones we dey get for the forum because before you go grow account reach this height you go understand say e no easy at all.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: martyns on January 20, 2023, 11:58:44 PMOne thing wey I don know Nigeria for be say,anything wey dem don decide to do,dem dey doam too much,and that too much nai dey make people of the world feel and talk say dem bad.When Niger people start to dey do scam,dem doam to the extend wey be say the thing don dey too common for street,and e don dey become our way of living.I no fit talk say we dey give ourselves bad news because say everybody know say e no easy to survive,and if e be say na dat one go work for them,dem dey doam fully.I swear bro and e no make sense, for the bad aspect of am, we done give ourselves bad name among other countries and our leaders no even care o, their own to to borrow money, you go turn on ur television you go here all manner of bad stuffs Nigerias dey do for another country.Na why some countries they tighten there travel requirements when it comes to Nigerians,If care is not take someday traveling our of this country to another go be very big problem oo.. becos them no go allow us, We need to repair our reputation o, and make Nigeria great again.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.body: Ranging from our politicians down to our primary school children¬† , there are few people who place value or importance on the Nigerian image,¬† we post nonsense to display our short comings on the internet and the global community has viewed us to be overly corrupt,¬† there are still honest people living in Nigeria¬† , We should stop ruining the image of this blessed country Nigeria¬† , it starts with us, it's not every of our short comings we should post online,¬† No country is a saint filled country, they know how to protect the image of their country in the eyes of the international community¬† ,We should protect ours because no-one will do it for us.¬† Thanks

comments.author: Philpsticks
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on January 14, 2023, 12:00:40 PMI nor dey try invalidate the message wey you dey pass o, but you see that India eh, na dem do fraud pass. Na just say na Naija own dem dey blow out of proportion. Back to your message - Some Nigerians don believe say without fraud them nor fit make am. The problem now come be say it is more than just getting a job in Affiliate marketing, copywriting, web developer, security analyst, these boys and girls nor dey patient again. They want the blink blink now. They want the pomp and pageantry now.. Dem want make dem sing dorime for them. And they want to hit it big. 100k, 200k ¬†and even 500k nor fit do anything for them. To commot for fraud na mind thing first before getting a job. No be lie bro many of them really wan get name for club and shows make them just they hype hype them and as you see those hype men ba they really know watin them dy do if they see say you get na you they go hype pass and other guys go they jealous to just work hard to get same money make they hype them too so I really go with you when you say to leave am na mind e no easy at all because were person they collect in block intact to get a job no go worry you because you will see the pay small government fit the pay 80k plus and you get client way they give $500 weekly na just mind bro i really get that point
